name: Glimpse of Belonging
description:
I took this photo with my grandfather's (who past away 8 years ago) old VHS camera. This image, embodied by a camera filled with the memories of the person I care about, is the view I see and be fascinated every time I look out of the window of my house.
It makes me feel how peaceful and happy the space I created is. Any place that reminds me of my lover, my two dogs and my three cats and makes me think about their existence, their place in my heart.
                I look out from my window, see this view
                I'm in my comfort zone, I find peace.
